postTradeSkipBars.Description: After trade filled skip n bars before new trade

maxIntraDayTrades.Description: Set maximum number of intraday trades

volumeFillLimit.Description: Maximum percent of volume to be used in filling trade

trailStopPct.Description: Exit trade after PnL falls n% from high PnL

trailStopThreshold.Description: Activate trailStop after PnL reaches n%

isIntraDay.Description: Exit trade at end of trading day

holdOverWeekend.Description: If yes: exit multiday trades before weekend

beginTrading.Description: Begin trading n minutes after market open

endTading.Description: End trading n minutes before market close

lastTradeTime.Description: Intraday trading: last trade = market close - n minutes

lastMultidayTradeTime.Description: Multiday trading: last trade = market close - n minutes

HoldOut.Description: Exclude n%; d = exclude dispersed; e = endOfSample

SPY.Description: Fin weighting; separate multiple weightings with comma

DIA.Description: Fin weighting; separate multiple weightings with comma
